ygData.subject: RE: Bard only equipment, a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: That doesn t mean GZ can t change his mind though.  If enough bards voiced a legitimate concern perhaps he could be convinced to eliminate the level 37 limit.
ygData.messageBody:
That doesn't mean GZ can't change his mind though. If enough bards voiced a
legitimate concern perhaps he could be convinced to eliminate the level 37
limit.

Galtin of E'ci


> > Sirens and Strike use wind. I would love a special wind
> > instrument that lets charm last longer, or be more reliable,
> > or gets us past the L37 limit.
>
> Getting past the l37 limit would help a lot. I think that was one of the
> more depressing things I found about high level. I didn't realise how
> much I'd come to depend on charm to bail out healers and casters from
> frenzied mobs until I couldn't use it anymore.
>
> Unfortunately, from that reply from GZ posted a while back, I can't see
> that happening. It seems he feels that having our charm last 15 sec
> compared to whatever time an enchanter's lasts isn't enough, so he
> doesn't want us to be able to charm at high levels. He said it would be
> too powerful.
>
>
